DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the safety and efficacy of OsmoPrep tablets versus HalfLytely and Bisacodyl Tablet Bowel Prep Kit in subjects who are undergoing colonoscopy.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of OsmoPrep® Tablets Versus HalfLytely® and Bisacodyl Tablet Bowel Prep Kit for Colon Cleansing
DOC.criteria: Between 18 and 70 years of age, inclusive Scheduled for colonoscopy within 21 days of the screening visit Able to swallow tablets the size of a multivitamin without difficulty History of biopsyproven acute phosphate nephropathy Known allergy or hypersensitivity to treatment arms History of gastric stapling or bypass procedure or history of gastric retention History of any other sodium phosphate preparation within 6 months prior to colonoscopy
